name: stackoverflow-api
description: ```sh  A user should create an account and login ``` ```sh A user should be able to create a post. ``` ```sh A user should be able to change his or her post. ``` ```sh A user should be able to delete a post. ``` ```sh A user should be able to view the created post ``` ```sh A user should be able to view all the created posts. ``` ```sh A user should be able to search for a post ```
